name: Volcanion
flavorText: It expels its internal steam from the arms on its back. It has enough power to blow away a mountain.

attacks.name: Concentrated Fire
attacks.text: Flip a coin for each Fire Energy attached to this Pokémon. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Combustion Impact
attacks.text: Your opponent switches his or her Active Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.
